data.title: Expensive and worth every penny
data.text:
I spent just one night here on business. Entering the small lobby gives you a much more comfortable feel than many hotels. As you enter from the valet parking, the front desk is immediately inside the door. It was well staffed at all times, I never saw anyone waiting. The staff from parking to front desk to restaurant to housekeeping is absolutely above all the rest. They were always warmly greeting me wherever I went. Security there is wonderful as you use your room key to get access to your floor unless you're going to the open floors (meeting rooms are on 5th floor.. etc ).
I had dinner at their restaurant, sea bass, and it was perfect. I don't particularly like fish unless it DOESN'T taste like fish so I only get that dish at upscale restaurants. Light, flaky and sooo fresh. 
There is a jazz group that played later Friday night in a small room between the bar and dining area. Perfect. Great music but far enough away that conversations were easy.
Professional basketball teams stay here at times,one was leaving as I was arriving, so you may run into a famous face if your timing is good.
Art work is plentiful everywhere and magnificent. I know nothing about art but I liked what I saw.
In all a beautiful hotel with great people and people make the experience the best.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Patrick J,

Wow, what an amazing review! Thank you so much for your kind words and really showcasing every aspect of what you enjoyed. We truly do our best to provide a memorable experience and are thrilled to see that we succeeded in doing so!
We hope to welcome you back in the near future - we would love to have you here again.

Thank you again for your feedback and sincere words.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Phillip and Benjamin are AWESOME!!!
data.text:
My wife and I stayed at this awesome hotel the night of our wedding reception. A year later we returned for our anniversary. The concierge, Phillip Haddock and front desk, Benjamin Deering welcomed us like we were superstars. They asked a few questions and were extremely attentive. Shortly after settling into our room, a knock at the door. Room service walks in with bottles of water, champagne, and a thoughtful happy anniversary card. 

This kind of service and attention to detail is why we truly enjoyed our stay. The room is amazing, location is amazing, but Phillip and Benjamin...they are awesome!  We hope your leaders read this review and REWARD you for the moments you create. Thank you for making our stay special!  Cheers.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Mr. & Mrs. Ramos,

Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize two of our valued employees, Benjamin and Phillip! We are so thrilled to see that they were able to really create a memorable stay for you both. It made them so happy to read your kind words and most importantly, to see how much it meant to you both!
We truly enjoyed having you here as our guests and hope to have the pleasure of many return visits!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Over priced, underserved
data.text: Stayed for business at this hotel with a large group.  However, for close to three-hundred a night plus taxes and exuberant parking fees, I would expect perfections.  Not rattelly tv remotes, un replenished coffee when they make the room, better lighting, more connectivity (plus, usb ports, ethernet, all which where non existent).   The furnishings a bit older than expected (ancient LCD TV screen, showerhead had no life), lighting in the room was abysmal.   No breakfast included !! Might as well just go down the road to that other H brand !!  Did I mention that the pool at my neighborhood was three times as nice and big as what they call a "pool"?

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Dimashqi2020,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We take matters such as the ones you mentioned very seriously. We pride in the service and amenities provided at the hotel and can see we fell short during your stay.
All of your feedback has been shared with the appropriate leaders. 
Please reach out to me personally so we can discuss further. I want to make sure we can welcome you back to showcase our true Grandn Bohemian experience!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overbooked!!
data.text: Arrived for a business meeting and was told the hotel was overbooked and my room had been given to someone else. Never had this happen in 20 years of travelling. Worst example of customer service I can think of.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello David M,

We definitely value your business and loyalty. I would love the opportunity to discuss this with you further. Our mission is to always leave our guests with a positive memorable experience and I can see we fell short of expectations. 
We certainly want to make sure that we get this all taken care of so we can welcome you back in the future. 
I hope to hear from you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great location, great hotel.
data.text: The hotel is in the perfect place in downtown Orlando, near church street. It's walking distance to many delicious restaurants and bars, but far enough away to have a quiet environment. The Boheme restaurant inside the hotel is really delicious and has a great ambiance. All the staff at the hotel were very helpful, and the rooms are amazing. I definitely recommend it.

owner_response.author: Nicole L, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Victoria Y,

Thank you for taking the time to share your review! We're thrilled you had a wonderful stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Better than expected
data.text:
Initial impressions are wow, this is really nice. Walking in the lobby and noting wonderful pieces of art and a unique decor the hotel pulls you more and more into the overall experience. The room was well appointed and the bed comfortable. The hamburger from the attached bar was....good but not what I expected. Not in a bad way, more in a YOU have to try it way. The staff was helpful and helped decide on something safe for a first time experience. The valet workers were polite and though I tipped each time I left they didn't make you feel obligated. Lastly the breakfast in the lounge was basic but good. I have been places where the eggs look generic, here they were fresh and the added potatoes were filling and left me wanting more  

Overall great hotel. Makes coming back from work in the am work the ride. 

Great experience.

owner_response.author: Nicole L, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello devaughn1972,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us! We’re so happy to see you were able to enjoy our amenities during your stay. We hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great time at Grand Bohemian
data.text:
A special treat in downtown Orlando is the Grand Bohemian Hotel. It's a beautiful building with interesting artwork throughout. The staff is friendly and helpful. 
Our room was large and nicely appointed.
If you are going to the Dr. Phillips Center for a performance, it is directly across the street.
I would definitely recommend it.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello beth9174,

Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback with us!
It is so nice to see that you enjoyed the art we are so prideful in. It is also so great to see that you enjoyed the friendliness of our staff!
We appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Review of Exceptional Staff Service (Mohammed Bhalwany*********)
data.text:
This hotel is top of the line for the following reasons:
1-Environment (clean and comfortable)
2-Style (Best decorations ever)- Top of the line Marriott hotel
3-Best Employees (Welcoming and full of integrity). I especially want to thank Mohammed Bhalwany for his treatmet while I was there last week. He was exceptional during a time when I needed help and the best rooms due to my daughter's wedding. I travel weekly and stay in many Marriott properties- this is one of the best.

owner_response.author: Lindsay S, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Novlett P,

Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and I will make sure Mohammed is recognized for his outstanding service. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Almost perfect, just needs fresh air
data.text: This is a lovely, stunning, extremely nice hotel.  I would rate it the best hotel I've ever stayed at if only the rooms had windows that open.  Alas, unlike many of the nearby apartment buildings with balconies and windows that open, this hotel, as with far too many Marriott properties, is a sealed building.  You are forced to breathe regurgitated air.  If you are fine with this you'll definitely enjoy your stay.  If you need or want fresh air you'll have to stay somewhere else.

owner_response.author: Nicole L, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello johnpilot,

We are so happy to hear you had a fantastic stay! I hope we can welcome you back again the next time your travels bring you to Orlando.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderfully central location to see the 'real' Florida!
data.text: We attended a family wedding here and were so happily impressed with the Grand Bohemian Hotel and its staff.   Our room/suite was lovely with a beautiful view over City Hall and the lakes.   Everything was very walkable and convenient and the hotel, world class!  In particular, the concierge, Phillip Haddock 11, made our stay even more enjoyable.  He was so knowledgeable and pleasant and is a great asset to the Grand Bohemian.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello surfmann14,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us!
We love our prime location as well & I am glad it was able to suit your needs.
Most of all, we are happy that the staff (in particular Phillip) was able to meet your expectations! We are definitely fortunate to have him here with us. 
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future!

Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Property Horrible Air Conditioning
data.text: I have stayed at the Bohemian many times. On this most recent visit management has found a new way to increase their profit. They now lock the thermostats in the rooms. What do you expect when you only pay nearly $400/night for a room, to be able to control your thermostat?  Not here.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello orders53,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.
We definitely do not lock the thermostats. You may have had a challenge with it that our engineering team could have taken a look at.
Our rooms are all set to go to the temperature of your desire. I apologize that you seemed to have had a challenge with that.
Please contact me directly if you would like to discuss further.

We hope to welcome you back soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Orlando's Best Hotel...for Adults
data.text:
The G-Bo is a gorgeous hotel. The moment you walk in, the architecture and decor treat the eyes. This hotel is not "stylishly decorated", it's art, which is why there isn't another one like it anywhere. We've stayed here many times for staycations and love the quiet privacy, sophistication, and design. The rooms are quite romantic, with a shuttered bath overlooking the bedroom, small bar, and comfortable seating areas, all treated to a great view of Orlando. It could not be better situated for a night out, living essentially at the epicenter of downtown's nightlife. Not that you really need to go anywhere, because both the restaurant and the lounge are destinations in their own right.

If you're looking for one of the many luxury hotels out by Disney, please don't stay here. This hotel isn't like those at all. The G-Bo is one of the crown jewels of real Orlando.

owner_response.author: Lindsay S, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Rob B,

Wow! Thank you for taking the time to share this wonderful feedback with us! We are thrilled that you were able to not only enjoy the hotel's many amenities, but also the nearby vicinity and the advantages of our great location! We look forward to your next visit!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Perfect location for a concert at Amway
data.text: Going to a concert at Amway theatre we wanted to be close so that we could walk from the hotel. Grand bohemian have the perfect location for that. The hotel staff where service minded and helpful, the hotel room was beautiful with a large bathroom.

owner_response.author: Lindsay S, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
JuneD65,

We are delighted to hear you had a wonderful stay! Come back and see us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice and comfortable, great service
data.text: The people here were wonderful, service is clearly a priority. From valet parking - very quick in and out - to front desk folks. All smiles, kind and helpful. There is wonderful art in lobby and on 5th floor that is worth checking out. Lots of places to go right out the front door. A good downtown option.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us!
It makes us even more happy to see that our staff is what you remember most. We truly do our best to provide a memorable and enjoyable interaction with our guests.

We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Way To Go Grand Bohemian
data.text: Wow This is One Great Location, Its Right Down The Street From Church Street Party🎯 And The Arena "Let's Go Magic" And The Staff Is A-1 😆 "A Little Expensive But It's Worth Every Penny Of Your Stay. And I LOVE THE VIEW OF THE CITY

owner_response.author: Lindsay S, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review

Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. Please come see us again soon!

data.title: Nice Getaway Weekend After Hurricane Matthew
data.text:
My sweetie & I had this 3-day weekend planned for a while.  It's about a 2 & 1/2 hour drive from Jacksonville, FL for us.  Hurricane Matthew made it's presence known to FL earlier in the week hitting Orlando Wednesday night & into Thursday then Jacksonville Thursday night & into Friday.  By Saturday, the sun was shining for us in Jacksonville & we left at lunch time.

The hotel did not have any damage or lose power.  Valet parking is the only option ($25 daily fee).  We were on the top floor (15th) & room was spacious & comfortable.  There's a mini-fridge that's already stocked w/water, beer, soda & wine.  When I inquired about a mini-fridge for personal use for the items we brought w/us, we were told that none were available & to check in the morning as people checked out.  In the meantime, we were told to empty the fridge of the items that were in there & put in our personal items until another fridge became available.  I questioned this since I knew the items in the fridge were on a time-sensor.  Once removed, you will be billed.  I was assured that the room account would have a note that we were using the fridge for our personal items.

I emptied the stocked mini-fridge & added our personal items.  On Sunday, a fridge became available & was delivered to the room.  We added our personal items & put back the other items in the other fridge.  Upon checkout we noticed that every item that was removed from the stocked mini-fridge had been added to our invoice.  The charges were promptly removed upon explanation.  Of note, the items on top where the TV is (2 Evian Water Bottles & several gourmet cans of nuts) are also on a time-sensor.

The workout room & pool are on the 6th floor.  Workout room is lavish.  Plenty of free weights, 2 bikes, 4 treadmills, 2 ellipticals, yoga mats, medicine balls, foam rollers, stretch bands (straps), et cetera.

Elevator only works w/room key.  Room floors are from 6th thru 15th.  Had one drink in the bar while waiting on our room to be ready.  Bar area also has restaurant.  

Hotel does recycle (I found this out when I called).  Bed was comfortable & we slept great.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello mayinfl,

Thank you so much for sharing your experience and going into great detail about all the different aspects of our hotel.
It was great to see your perspective of everything and for the most part it looks like you really enjoyed your time here.
Happy to see we were able to make your stay comfortable during this time and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Changing rooms
data.text:
The first room was on a low floor and close to elevator so I ask for another and was given a jr suite on higher floor. We were very satisfied but the decor is quite busy. 
I don't know if I would stay here unless a good price .

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello James M,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us!
I'm glad to see that our staff was able to accommodate you with a comfortable suite and that you enjoyed your accommodations. 
As for our decor - we select everything to fit into our "Bohemian" ambiance. We want our guests to truly feel inspired by our passion for our art & music.
I hope you decide to visit us again! I would love to personally give you a tour of everything our hotel has to offer!

Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Perfect
data.text: The hotel is perfectly located near Amway Arena, Church Street Station, and countless great brewpubs and restaurants.  There is a Starbucks connected to the hotel as well, which was really nice.  There is also a restaurant/bar area in the hotel.  We were only there one night and didn't get a chance to stop in, but it looked great.  The rooms were very clean and quiet (pictures included).  We'll definitely stay here again.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us!
It looks like you had a great opportunity to visit the area and all of the hotel. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed our amenities. 
Thank you for also sharing pictures for our guests - they came out wonderful!

We hope to welcome you back in the near future
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Such a great hotel!!!
data.text: We came in from North Carolina to see the last Orlando Pride soccer game and stayed at this hotel and all grew staff was super nice and very accommodating throughout our stay! The hotel is absolutely beautiful and there is a Starbucks down stairs so it does not get better than that. The wife and I will definitely be staying there again!

owner_response.author: Lindsay S, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello kOsborneEvans,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pricey but nice
data.text: The Grand Bohemian is in a convenient location. It is a very nice, upscale hotel. The price is a little more than I would expect. All of the staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean. The pool is smaller than I expected it to be.

owner_response.author: Delayne H, Front Office Manager at Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando, Autograph Collection, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello TamL86,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us!
We are happy to see that you enjoyed the friendliness of our staff and the cleanliness of your room.
We hope to welcome you back in the future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
